card.name: Dragonstorm Harbinger
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast face down cards or pay morph costs. Whenever a creature you control is turned face up, you may sacrifice this creature. If you do, turn target creature an opponent controls face down. (It's a 2/2 creature.)

card.text: Flying Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When this creature enters or is turned face up, you may have target creature you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Amirah the Heartpiercer

card.text: At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 black Warrior creature token with "This creature can't block." {3}{W}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Warriors you control gain lifelink until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.text: Breakneck Charge deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Create a 1/1 black Warrior creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Sleetstrike
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Target player draws two cards. You may return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Soulclaimer Rakshasa
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever this creature enters or deals combat damage to a player, search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

card.name: Stormsinger's Song
card.text: Stormsinger's Song deals 2 damage to each player. Those players each discard two cards, then you draw a card for each card you discarded this way.

card.name: Style of the Great Teacher
card.text: Monks you control have vigilance. At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn and cast a noncreature spell this turn, put a stance counter on this enchantment. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each stance counter on this enchantment.

card.name: Sultai Command
card.text: Choose two — • Target player creates a 1/1 green Snake creature token with deathtouch. • Target player mills two cards, then returns a permanent card from their graveyard to their hand. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You gain 3 life. • Counter target spell with mana value 4 or less.

card.name: Sultai Skullspeaker
card.text: Menace When Sultai Skullspeaker enters, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Sunfire Eruption
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature you don't control.

card.name: Surrak's Pulverizer
card.text: Huntcall (If you attacked with total power 8 or greater this turn, you call the hunt for the rest of the game.) Trample Whenever this creature attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. If you've called the hunt, you may cast it without paying its mana cost this turn.

card.name: Swathe of Dragonfire
card.text: Choose one or both — • Swathe of Dragonfire deals X damage to target creature without flying. • Swathe of Dragonfire deals X damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Taigam, Firebrand Speaker
card.text: Flash Whenever Taigam enters or attacks, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Then, you may cast a copy of a card exiled with Taigam. (You still pay its costs.)

card.name: Taigam's Skirmisher
card.text: Flying, first strike Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Temur Command
card.text: Choose two — • Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owner's hands. • Return up to two target cards each with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. • Temur Command deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. • Target player creates a 5/5 green Bear creature token with trample.

card.name: Temur Frostwalker
card.text: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. {2}{U}: This creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Timeline Schism
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. During that turn, creatures you control are red Dragons with base power and toughness 4/4 and flying in addition to their other types and abilities. Exile Timeline Schism.

card.name: War-Horde Chieftain
card.text: Menace This creature's toughness is equal to the number of Warriors you control. Whenever you attack, you may pay {X}{WB}. If you do, create X 1/1 black Warrior creature tokens with "This creature can't block." They're tapped and attacking.

card.name: Unforgiving Climate
card.text: Each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is its power. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Zahmur's Bond
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to two target creatures you control. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Zephyr Assembly // Call of the Winds
card.text:
Ward {1} Other Monks you control get +1/+1.
---
Scry 2, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Monk card, put it into your hand. (Whenever this attacks, you may cast a copy of its technique.)

card.name: Zurgo's Vanguard
card.text: Opponents can't cast spells or activate nonmana abilities during your turn. {4}{R}{W}, Discard this card: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Untap them. If it's your turn, after your next main phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability costs {4} less to activate if it's not your turn.
